Posts.Content: May 5, 2017 11:37PM gigi21 wrote: marigoldgirl- I had #15 out of 33 treatments today and so far so good. I had 14 nodes removed and so far no issues. My lymphedema therapist gave me exercises and massage techniques to do daily, but honestly I only do them 3-4 times weekly. I have mild sunburn like sensations, but my skin looks fine. I also have some soreness inside my breast and armpit. I am using Miaderm 3-4 times daily. I wish you the best!
Posts.Title: Starting Radiation in May 2017 Tappermom383 smarchez
